title: Font Specimen Sheet Software?
content: I'm looking for way to create a font specimen sheet for a couple fonts that includes glyphs and alternate characters. Does anyone know of software, or a feature in InDesign or Suitcase?
author: pacedesign

comments.content: There are several available. Google "type specimen software", then read the reviews.

If it should include all characters, including those without a Unicode value, I would recommend this one:  
 [http://indesignsecrets.com/make-a-font-contact-sheet-in-indesign.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421092745/http:/indesignsecrets.com/make-a-font-contact-sheet-in-indesign.php "http://indesignsecrets.com/make-a-font-contact-sheet-in-indesign.php")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421092745im_/http:/typophile.com/files/for-font-finder_4762.jpg)
